Package game.items.consumables

Class RefreshingFlask

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.consumables.RefreshingFlask
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, ConsumeAbility, PlayerPurchase, PlayerSell, Upgrade
public class RefreshingFlask
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
implements PlayerSell, PlayerPurchase, Upgrade, ConsumeAbility
A class representing a refreshing flask item that can be dropped by an actor. This item has the capability to refresh the actor.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double ASK_PRICE_MULTIPLIER
    A multiplier used to calculate the ask price for a Refreshing Flask when sold by a traveller.
    static int BONUS_MULTIPLIER
    A multiplier used to calculate the bonus price of a Refreshing Flask.
    static int DEFAULT_BOUND
    The default bound value used for random calculations.
    static int TRAVELLER_ASK_PROBABILITY
    The probability that a traveller will ask for a lower price when purchasing a Refreshing Flask.
    static int TRAVELLER_TAKE_PROBABILITY
    The probability that a traveller will take the Refreshing Flask at a bonus price.

  • Constructor Details

    • RefreshingFlask

      public RefreshingFlask()
      Constructor to create a RefreshingFlask. Initializes the name, display character, portability, and adds the capability to refresh the actor.

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the owner actor. It includes the RefreshAction to perform a health regain action on the actor.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the RefreshingFlask.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the owner actor.

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions for the RefreshingFlask when it's in a location. It includes the SellAction against other actors (who have MERCHANT status) at the location.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      otherActor - The actor to perform actions on.
      location - The location where the RefreshingFlask is.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions.

    • upgradeItem

      public void upgradeItem()
      Upgrades the item by increasing the stamina regain attribute and marking it as upgraded. After the upgrade, the stamina regain is set to 1, and the item is marked as upgraded with the UPGRADED capability.
      Specified by:
      upgradeItem in interface Upgrade

    • consumeItem

      public java.lang.String consumeItem​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Represents the action of an actor consuming a Refreshing Flask.
      Specified by:
      consumeItem in interface ConsumeAbility
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor that is consuming the Refreshing Flask.
      map - the GameMap on which the action is performed.
      Returns:
      a message or description of the consumption action.
